description:
A girl who`s a high dryad, a rare species of fairy that lives in forests and forest dungeons. She`s very gentle and easygoing, but has a mysterious power that lets her control the forest plants. Her attack skill is Branch Whip, which summons whips made of plants to strike down the enemy. She`s good friends with Lily, and both of them dream of visiting a human city one day.
Source: Official page
name: Feri
